comments:
I shutdown the workbench when there was a suspended thread in the debugger, 
with source showing and got the following NPE. Not sure is this is a debugger 
bug or a workbench bug.

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable 
(java.lang.NullPointerException)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:1887)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Synchronizer.runAsyncMessages
(Synchronizer.java:96)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runAsyncMessages(Display.java:1385)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:1203)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.release(Display.java:1253)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device.dispose(Device.java:198)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.run(Workbench.java:803)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:821)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:285)
	at SlimLauncher.main(SlimLauncher.java:14)
*** Stack trace of contained exception ***
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.EditorPresentation.getVisibleEditor
(EditorPresentation.java:133)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.EditorManager.getVisibleEditor
(EditorManager.java:231)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkbenchPage.getActiveEditor
(WorkbenchPage.java:686)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.LaunchView.clearSourceSelection
(LaunchView.java:439)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.LaunchViewEventHandler.clearSourceSelection
(LaunchViewEventHandler.java:296)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.LaunchViewEventHandler.doHandleResumeEvent
(LaunchViewEventHandler.java:100)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.LaunchViewEventHandler.doHandleDebugEvent
(LaunchViewEventHandler.java:78)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.AbstractDebugEventHandler$1.run
(AbstractDebugEventHandler.java:60)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.RunnableLock.run(RunnableLock.java:29)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Synchronizer.runAsyncMessages
(Synchronizer.java:93)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runAsyncMessages(Display.java:1385)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:1203)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.release(Display.java:1253)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device.dispose(Device.java:198)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.run(Workbench.java:803)

	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:285)
	at SlimLauncher.main(SlimLauncher.java:14)

Appears to be a problem with EditorPresentation.  If it has been disposed, 
there are many NPEs lurking as the field 'editorArea' is set to null on 
dispose, yet the code does not check for this state.  Nick?

Removed null field setting from EditorPresentation.dispose() and 
EditorArea.dispose().
Please try with this change.

Have you seen this again?
Can this PR be closed?
My opinion is that the pr can be closed...have not seen the problem.
have not seen the problem. Can close.
Closing since we do not have a reproduceable case.
